title: 🎓 Novice
description: Easy to take care. Begginers' plants!

title: 🎓 Green thumb
description: A bit more of attention is required.

title: 🎓 Expert
description: Save these plants for when you fill as a gardening badass.

title: ☀ Low-moderate
description: Can handle low light, but will thrive in bright and indirect light.

title: ☀ Bright, indirect
description: Light the morning sun. In the afternoon, only filtered light.

title: ☀ Full sun
description: Needs the sun light in its full potencial.

title: 💦 Low
description: For the succulents. Water only dried-out soils.

title: 💦 Moderate
description: The majority of the plants are here. Left the top 5 cm of the soil dry out.

title: 💦 High
description: Keep it moistyyy!

title: 🪴 Well-draining
description: Potting mix with perlite, reducing moisture retention.

title: 🪴 Moisture-retaining
description: Potting mix with coir or coco peat are the best!

title: 🪴 Coarse + Sandy
description: Potting mix with lots of sand and grit.

title: ♨️ None
description: Do not mist! It can bring funghi and other ecological disbalances.

title: ♨️ Low
description: Mist in the summer, but go well without it.

title: ♨️ Medium
description: Many of them like it moisty! Use a water spritz or a pebble tray.

title: ♨️ High
description: Like a lot of humidity. Maybe a humidifier would be a good idea.

title: 🌱 Stem cuttings
description: Cut it at a 45° angle, ensuring one or two nodes with some leaves in them.

title: 🌱 Plantlets + Offsets
description: Baby plants that usually appears in the basis of the mother plant.

title: 🌱 Leaf cuttings
description: Remove from the stem + give it a help (honey or saliva) → potting mix. Easy!

title: 🌱 Division
description: Separate a plant in two. Use a clean knife and lots of love. It can be very stressful.
